trigger.subject: Partnership opportunity - Grow your audience 10x!
trigger.body:
Hi there!

I'm reaching out from GrowthHackers Pro. We help course creators like you 10x their audience using our proprietary AI-powered marketing system.

We've helped over 500 creators increase their revenue by an average of 340%!

Would you like to schedule a quick 15-minute call to learn more?

Best,
Jake
GrowthHackers Pro
